filters.filter: Cases I should have closed months ago

response.cases:
-- count is included in the cases attribute
-- note: currently move, spam, and remind are not supported actions. Older version of the API which call -- the deprecated cmd=list (instead of cmd=search&q=) will not see reply, forward, or email operations -- in the case listing
123 -- case number true -- true if open, false if closed Duck, Duck... but No Goose! -- title
I searched the docs, but no goose!
-- short string with case's latest comment 1151 -- ixBugEvent for latest event with actual text comment 22 -- project id The Farm -- project name 35 -- area id Pond -- area name 6 -- group id 1 -- person case is assigned to (id) Old MacDonald -- person case is assigned to (name)
grandpa@oldmacdonald.com
-- email of person case is assigned to 2 -- person case was opened by (id) 2 -- person case was resolved by (id)
-- person case was closed by (id) 0 -- person case was last edited by (id) 2 -- status (id) Geschlossen (Fixed) -- status (name) 3 -- priority (id) Must Fix -- priority (name) 3 -- fixfor (id) Test -- fixfor (name) 2007-05-06T22:47:59Z -- date of fixfor (date)
-- version field (custom field #1)
-- computer field (custom field #2) 0 -- hours of original estimate (0 if no estimate) 0 -- hours of current estimate 0 -- total elapsed hours 0 -- number of occurrences (minus 1) of this bug (increased via bugzscout) -- to display the actual number of occurrences, add 1 to this number
-- if there is a customer contact for this case, this is their email 0 -- if this case came in via dispatcho, the mailbox it came in on 1 -- category (id) Feature -- category (name) 2007-05-06T22:47:59Z -- date case was opened 2007-05-06T22:47:59Z -- date case was resolved 2007-05-06T22:47:59Z -- date case was closed 1151 -- latest bugevent 2007-05-06T22:47:59Z -- the date when this case was last updated false -- has this case been replied to? false -- has this case been forwarded?
-- id for customer to view bug (bug number + 8 letters e.g. 4003_XFLFFFCS) 0 -- id of discussion topic if case is related
-- date this case is due (empty if no due date)
-- release notes 1151 -- the ixBugEventLatest when you last viewed this case 2007-05-06T22:47:59Z -- the date when you last viewed this case 345,267,2920 -- comma separated list of other related case numbers Main.cpp:165 -- if this case is a Scout case, this ID is the unique identifier
Please contact us or visit our knowledge base to resolve.
-- this is the message -- displayed to users when they submit a case that matches this sScoutDescription false -- whether we are still recording occurrences of this crash or not true -- true if you are subscribed to this case, otherwise false

events.event:
174 -- Identity field in the database for this event 4 -- Number for type of event, see event codes Assigned to Captain Caveman -- Description of event in English always 3 -- Identity field of the person who made this event happen Mikey -- Person's full name 2007-05-06T22:47:59Z -- Date event happened (in RFC822 UTC format) Up up and away! -- The text of the event (if this is an email, this is a simple view of the message) false -- True if it is an email event false -- True if this case was created via an incoming email, discussion topic, or BugzScout Project changed from 'Inbox' to 'Cave'. -- Description of changes to the case during this event
Captain Caveman von Mikey zugewiesen
-- Description of event in YOUR language (in this case German)
Test Word.doc -- name of the attached file
default.asp?pg=pgDownload&pgType=pgAttachment&ixBugEvent=756&sPart=2&sTicket=&sFileName=Test%20Word.doc
-- url to hit to get the contents of the attached file (add on token= yourtoken)
-- if the event is an email (bEmail == true) then there are additional fields --
"JJ Walker" <jj @ dynomite.org> -- the from header from the message good@times.org -- the to header from the message
-- the cc header from the message
-- the bcc header from the message (if readable)
-- the replyto header from the message
-- the subject header from the message 5 Jun 07 21:07:54 GMT -- the date header from the message (exactly as it appears usually rfc822 date)
-- the body plaintext from the message
-- the message formatted in html

projects.project: 68 -- project id The Farm -- project name 6 -- person who is the default owner for this project (id) Old MacDonald -- name of owner grandpa@oldmacdonald.com -- email of owner 555-294-4778 -- phone of owner false -- true if this is the Inbox project 1 -- type of group this project is part of (1 = client / 2 = dept) 1 -- group (id) this project is part of Internal -- name of group this project is part of

areas.area:
53 -- area id Bug -- area name 23 -- project (id) this area belongs to Antioch, CA -- project (name) this area belongs to
-- default owner of this area. if empty then use project owner
-- name of owner of this area. if empty then use project owner 0 -- type of area: 0 = normal, 1 = Not Spam, 2 = Undecided, 3 = Spam (Inbox areas only) 0 -- number of documents trained into area (autosorted areas only)

priorities.priority: 1 -- priority id Very Urgent -- priority name
2 -- priority id Very Urgent -- priority name

categories.category: 1 -- category id Bug -- category name Bugs -- category plural name 2 -- when a case of this category type is resolved, the status id of the default (selected) status false -- true if this is a schedule item category

response.workingSchedule:
2 -- person owner (id) of this schedule 8 -- hrs of day that are actually devoted to work 9 -- military hour that workday starts 9am = 9 / 5pm = 17 17 -- military hour that workday ends 9am = 9 / 5pm = 17 true -- whether there is time off for lunch 12 -- military hour that lunch starts 0.5 -- hours long that lunch lasts 2007-05-06T22:39:31Z -- the date these values were last changed
-- if value is true, then it is considered a workday false true true true true true false

intervals.interval: 2 -- case id for this interval 8 -- interval (id) 9 -- start time of interval 17 -- end time of interval 1 -- title of case 12 -- person this interval applies to
